EmailTemplate.name: 18-CSP-PS for CSPs 2018-PS Exec Summary-Gated pages-T00255.Auto Responder
EmailTemplate.subject: Here's the download you requested.
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
View as web page <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]> Here's the download you requested. Hello {{lead.First Name:default=Sir/Madam}},
Here is your executive summary to download: Making the case for governments to run public safety communications on commercial LTE networks.
Want to learn more, please visit our hub page <[[https://networks.nokia.com/its-time-for-action]]>. © {{my.CopyrightYear}} Nokia.
Nokia: Karaportti 3, 2610 Espoo, Finland Contact Us <[[{{my.ContactUs}}]]> · Privacy <[[{{my.PrivacyPolicy}}]]> · Unsubscribe <[[{{system.unsubscribeLink}}]]> <[[{{my.SocialURL-Twitter}}]]> <[[{{my.SocialURL-Linkedin}}]]> <[[{{my.SocialURL-Facebook}}]]> <[[{{my.SocialURL-Youtube}}]]> <[[{{my.SocialURL-Blog}}]]> This message has been sent to you because of your relationship with Nokia’s networks business or its third-party licensors who are trusted partners of Nokia.
